description: Providing strategic asssitance to operationalize the Road Map Towards Safer Sri Lanka- visionary document for Disaster Risk Management in the country

subproject.corporate outcome: Building capacity of institutions and communities in disaster risk management and sustainable use of natural resources
subproject.description: Mainstreaming disaster risk reduction into development planning needs strengthening or development of country specific policies, tools, approaches and partnerships. The Project provides enabling environment required for mainstreaming DRR into development process at national and sub national levels by supporting national level hazard profile development for coastal hazards, cyclones, droughts, floods and landslides; strategic environment assessments, building guidelines; climate change adaptation practices, supporting the National Disaster Management Coordinating Committee, the national platform in line with HFA; development of educational and training material and training and capacity development of national and sub national level Govt., NGO and others.  The project also supports the operation of the Programme Management Unit of UNDP based at the Disaster Management Centre and the capacity building of staff.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: OPERATIONALIZE THE ROAD MAP
